themes: lack of transparency in funding decisions
barriers for low-income and under-resourced groups
threats to free community arts events
key_phrases: a small group of arts representatives have dominated access
the rest of the community learning only recently
lobbying ACME for changes to how arts funding is distributed
50% matching funds for COA funding is back on the table
huge barrier to groups that don’t have wealthy donors
requiring arts to charge in order to match
keeps the arts in the hands of a privileged minority
barriers_identified: lack of wealthy donors among some groups
solutions_proposed: eliminate or reconsider the 50% matching fund requirement
